This is that thread, post away
My Suggestions: "a little street sweeper" - Become King as the Reaper

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
Cup Bearer: Win 1 game as Butler
Meal Carrier: Win 5 games as Butler
Hallway Waiter: Win 10 games as Butler
Royal Attendant: Win 25 games as Butler

Under Servitude: Win 1 game as Servant
Hidden Service: Win 5 game as Servant
Trusted Helper: Win 10 games as Servant
Royal Assistance: Win 25 games as Servant

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
Day 3

Party of One - Try to convert yourself.
??? - Die twice in a single game.
Deceived - As Black Rose, be voted to live after being accused for treason.
I’m Not Who You Think I Am! - Be executed for treason as a Blue Dragon.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
Day 2
The Voice In My Head - Cause a Bulter/Servant to use Private Matter on themselves.
Is My Knife Dull? - As the Assassin, try to kill a night-immune role.
For The People - As the King, save someone from being killed with Assist.
I Shall Not Be Decived - As King, use Decide Fate to execute a Black Rose/Cult member.
Gut Feeling - As King, use Decide Fate to save a Blue Dragon member.
Poison-type - Try to poison someone with poison resistance/Get poisoned while you have poison resistance.
Antidote - As Physician, save someone who was affected by Nightshade.
Maybe The Drug Was Too Strong… - As Herbalist, your Drug target kills a member of the Black Rose.
medic pls - As Priest, revive the Physician.
Already In The Job Description - As Sheriff, use Posse Comitatus on a Knight.
Shadowed - As an Investigative class, investigate on a Mastermind who has In The Shadows active.
The Royal Party - Three or more Nobles reveal themselves to take the throne.
…And I Stand Alone/…And Then There Was One - Finish game as the only living player.
Speed Round/Speedrun - Win within three days.
A Shot In The Dark - Kill a Black Rose/Cult member on the first night.
You’re Talking To The Wrong God - Try to convert the Reaper.
Just Between Us - As an Apostle, use Eavesdrop to hear a Butler’s/Servant’s Private Matter.
Backfire Squared/Backfire Bonanza - As a Court Wizard/Sage/Invoker, use Pants on Fire/Dark Rune/Bewilder on a CW/Sage/Invoker, and they use PoF/DR/Bewilder.
Didn’t Leave A Suicide Note - As Sage, use Shock on a killing role.
I Don’t Care If You Can’t Die - As Reaper, kill a night immune role at night.
??? - As a Reaper, use Icy Touch on a Priest.
Death Jr. - Possess the Reaper.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
Day 1
Wrong Side of Town - As Sheriff, reveal yourself to a member of the Black Rose.
Alcoholic - Be occupied by the Butler/Servant twice in a row.
Can’t Stop Me Now - Try to occupy the Possessor.
??? - Occupy someone who is being occupied by the Possessor.
Sorry, I Didn’t Mean To! - As the Psychic, force a player to accuse someone of his own faction.

More to come.

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
Hippolytus:

Your Own Medicine- Make the Assassin poison himself as the Court Wizard

that would be a fun thing to attempt to do :3

Hippolytus:

Gotcha! - Find a member of the BlackRose as the Sherriff

That sounds oddly similar to the ToS achievement

Hippolytus:

Long Live the King - Become king as any role

This sounds more like “Live till the end of the game as king” kind of achievement name though

Read full topic

item.title: Achievement Suggestions Masterthread
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Here are a few i thought of:

Your Own Medicine- Make the Assassin poison himself as the Court Wizard
Second Chance - Be revived (or revive someone maybe)
The King is Dead - Successfully kill an enemy king as any role
Long Live the King - Become king as any role
Prince Charming - Execute an evil player as the Prince
Judas - Convert someone as the Mastermind.
Gotcha! - Find a member of the BlackRose as the Sherriff
The Killing Joke - Be hung as the Fool

Read full topic
